name: TeethBloom
description:
This game is a simple very short experiance all about one mans journey.

BUG WARNING: there is a bug on the second to last level where something will happen what it suppose to last alot longer but it only happens for a split of a second. I tried to fix it but decided to upload insted first. :)

This is a game i made with a HORRIBLE game engine called CopperCube6. I tried my best to make a playable experiance but there are some large bugs and issues i coludent fix.

P.S also this isnt my standard type of game i normally use GameMakerStudio2 and make actual games in it.
